Description: Linen mummy-wrapping bearing Book of the Dead chapters for Padimin in Hieratic text.
Curator's comments: Published: Mosher, The Papyrus of Hor, (2001), p. 16 n 79 & 81, p.77-8, p.79 n.2, 85 n.30&32&39. Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Quirke 1993 / Owners of funerary papyri in the British Museum (176)
Korenberg 2007 / The effect of ultraviolet-filtered light on the mechanical strength of fabrics (p.24, fig.1b)
